page.title: 04Local Farm Machinery
page.content: From our research we found out from Mr Lole who rents Hermitage farm that a brand new Combined harvester costs about Â£38000, a new fork lift truck costs Â£15000. At Hermitage farm they use a lot of machinery like a mower, plough, grain trailer, hay tedder, elevator and a bail sledge.A bail sledge can carry 12 bails of hay.Mr Lole the farmer has 5 tractors on his farm. One of the 5 tractors is 78 horse power another is 100 horse power. One of the tractors, that is 78 horse power, can have three types of back wheels. Hermitage farm was one of the first farms to have computerisation in the Herefordshire and Worcestershire district. The computers used were a make called Apple. The computers help by calculating how much to spray the crops.
